headline: Comcast (CMCSA): Evaluating Valuation as Wireless, Theme Parks, and Tech Partnerships Drive New Investor Focus
summary: Comcast, fresh from a string of strategic milestones, is catching the eye of investors after completing a $480 million debt exchange and revealing record growth in its wireless and theme park businesses. The company’s latest moves highlight a combination of steady performance and global expansion. See our latest analysis for Comcast. Amid a flurry of expansion and innovation, including new Lift Zones, a major WiFi technology partnership in Europe, and ongoing acquisitions speculation,...

headline: Here's What to Expect From Comcast’s Next Earnings Report
summary: Comcast is scheduled to report its third-quarter results later this month, with analysts projecting a modest low-single-digit decline in earnings.

headline: How Comcast’s (CMCSA) European WiFi Mesh Move with Deutsche Telekom Shapes Its Global Strategy
summary: In early October 2025, Comcast completed several significant debt refinancing actions, issuing new US$480 million 5.168% notes due 2037 as part of private exchange and cash offers for its existing notes, while also expanding its high-speed Internet and digital inclusion programs through new Lift Zones and service extensions across multiple markets. The company also announced a major WiFi Mesh technology collaboration in Europe with Deutsche Telekom, highlighting Comcast's ongoing focus on...

The company also announced a major WiFi Mesh technology collaboration in Europe with Deutsche Telekom, highlighting Comcast's ongoing focus on...

headline: Comcast Technology Solutions and Deutsche Telekom Partner to Deliver Advanced Whole-Home WiFi in Europe
summary: PHILADELPHIA & BONN, Germany, October 14, 2025--Comcast Technology Solutions (CTS), a division of Comcast delivering media and connectivity innovations globally, today announced a major collaboration with Deutsche Telekom (DT) to introduce cutting-edge, whole-home WiFi Mesh technology in Europe.
